thought: To craft a polished_granite_slab, I need to craft 4 polished_granites. Each polished_granite requires 4 granites, each granite requires a diorite and a quartz. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the diorites from slot 23 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
